story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Koeleman accountants & tax advisors was founded in 1970 with a clear mission: to provide entrepreneurs with clear, practical, and result-oriented financial advice. What started as a small office in Hilversum has grown into a versatile group of specialists.
story.paragraph2: Over the years, we have remained true to our core values: professionalism, approachability, and a down-to-earth approach. We believe in personal relationships and act as an extension of your team. Today, we combine decades of experience with the latest technology to offer you the best possible service.
